body:
Hi guys!
A minor problem: the card "Victim of night" shows the picture "Doom Blade" instead. I deleted the pictures of both cards and downloaded them again, but it's still wrong.
I am using version 1.19
author: [efranc...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103507307054111542324/)
title: Victim of night: wrong picture

comments.body:
Thanks for the report! Fixed in revision 37c2e434b619

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:

Hi guys!
